prompts: Create a ghost-type Pokemon with a haunting glow and elegant chandelier design.
Imagine a spooky character that floats in the air, surrounded by flickering flames.
Generate a Pokemon that resembles an ornate candle holder with purple flames.
Design a ghostly Pokemon with a mysterious aura and intricate features.
Show me a Pokemon that embodies the spirit of a haunted mansion.
Make a chilling Pokemon that uses its flames to confuse and scare opponents.
Give me a Pokemon that combines elegance and eeriness in its visual style.

distinctive_features: Elegant design with candle holder appearance
